metadata.homeTitle: Claude Skill Hub — AI-Powered Skill Directory
metadata.homeDescription: Search Claude Code skills in one place, verify quality through community ratings, and install with one click. A curated directory auto-collected from GitHub.
metadata.skillsDescription: Search and filter Claude Code skills by category, tag, or keyword. Discover skills for development, testing, DevOps, productivity, documentation, and more.

home.title: Discover Claude Code Skills
home.subtitle: AI-powered, community-verified skill directory
home.searchPlaceholder: What skill are you looking for?
home.browseAllDesc: Search by category, tag, or keyword to find the skill you need

allSkills.title: All Skills
allSkills.subtitle: Search and filter all registered skills
allSkills.searchPlaceholder: Search by skill name or keyword
allSkills.noResultsHint: Try different keywords or browse categories

skill.accountTooNew: Your account must be at least 30 days old to vote.

about.title: Claude Skill Directory
about.heroDesc: An open-source directory that automatically collects Claude Code skills from GitHub and structures them so anyone can easily discover and install them.
about.step1Desc: We automatically discover and collect Claude Code skills from GitHub topics and the official Anthropic repository.
about.step2Desc: README and SKILL.md are analyzed to extract installation steps, usage guides, and examples in a readable format.
about.step3Desc: Users vote on skills, and real install counts and view counts help surface the best tools.
about.whyDesc1: Claude Code skills are growing fast, but they're scattered across GitHub. Official and community skills aren't in one place, making it easy to miss great tools.
about.whyDesc2: This directory lets you search skills in one place, verify quality through community ratings, and install with a single command.
about.feature1Desc: Copy the install command and paste it in your terminal. That's it.
about.feature2Desc: Full bilingual interface. Understand global skills regardless of language.
about.feature3Desc: Sign in with Google to vote on skills. Only accounts older than 30 days can vote.
about.feature4Desc: Track views, installs, and votes in real time to quickly identify popular skills.
about.ctaDesc: Browse development, testing, DevOps, productivity, documentation, and more categories to find the skill you need.

discover.title: Discover
discover.subtitle: Check out newly added and trending skills

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.loginDesc: Sign in with Google to see your installed skills, votes, and usage patterns.
dashboard.mySkillsEmptyDesc: Copy install commands from skill detail pages — they'll be tracked here automatically.
dashboard.noPatternYet: Install skills to see your usage patterns here.
dashboard.requestDesc: Know a skill that's not listed? Share the GitHub URL.
dashboard.requestSuccess: Request submitted! We'll review and add it soon.
